verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> also came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, you <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, which have <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H241>not<s%>; they have ears to <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4805>not<s%>: for they are a rebellious <S%H1004>house<s%>.

<S%H1121>Therefore<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H6213>prepare<s%> your <S%H3627>stuff<s%> for <S%H1473>removing<s%>, and <S%H1540>remove<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>; and you shall <S%H1540>remove<s%> from your <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>: it may be they will <S%H7200>consider<s%>, though they be a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Then shall you bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> your <S%H3627>stuff<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>, as <S%H3627>stuff<s%> for <S%H1473>removing<s%>: and you shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> at <S%H6153>evening<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>, as they that go <S%H4161>forth<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity<s%>.
<S%H2864>Dig<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>, and carry out <S%H3318>thereby<s%>.

In their <S%H5869>sight<s%> shall you <S%H5375>bear<s%> it upon your <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>, and carry it <S%H3318>forth<s%> in the <S%H5939>twilight<s%>: you shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%>, that you <S%H7200>see<s%> not the <S%H776>ground<s%>: for I have <S%H5414>set<s%> you for a <S%H4159>sign<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And I <S%H6213>did<s%> so as I was <S%H6680>commanded<s%>: I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H3627>stuff<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>, as <S%H3627>stuff<s%> for <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, and in the <S%H6153>even<s%> I <S%H2864>dug<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> with my <S%H3027>hand<s%>; I brought it <S%H3318>forth<s%> in the <S%H5939>twilight<s%>, and I <S%H5375>bore<s%> it upon my <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>.
And in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, has not the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6213>you<s%>, What do you?

<S%H559>Say<s%> you unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; This <S%H4853>burden<s%> concerns the <S%H5387>prince<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that are among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

<S%H559>Say<s%>, I am your <S%H4159>sign<s%>: like as I have <S%H6213>done<s%>, so shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H1473>them<s%>: they shall remove and <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>.

And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> that is <S%H8432>among<s%> them shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> upon his <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> in the <S%H5939>twilight<s%>, and shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%>: they shall <S%H2864>dig<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> to carry <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3680>thereby<s%>: he shall cover his <S%H6440>face<s%>, <S%H3282>that<s%> he <S%H7200>see<s%> not the <S%H776>ground<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

My <S%H7568>net<s%> also will I <S%H6566>spread<s%> upon <S%H8610>him<s%>, and he shall be taken in my <S%H4686>snare<s%>: and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>; yet shall he not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4191>it<s%>, though he shall die there.

And I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> toward every <S%H7307>wind<s%> all that are <S%H5439>about<s%> him to <S%H5828>help<s%> <S%H102>him<s%>, and all his bands; and I will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%>.
And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, when I shall <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them in the <S%H776>countries<s%>.

But I will <S%H3498>leave<s%> a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of them from the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, from the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and from the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>; that they may <S%H5608>declare<s%> all their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> where they <S%H935>come<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came to <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H7494>quaking<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> your <S%H4325>water<s%> with <S%H7269>trembling<s%> and with <S%H1674>carefulness<s%>;

And <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H127>land<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H1674>carefulness<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> their <S%H4325>water<s%> with <S%H8078>astonishment<s%>, that her <S%H776>land<s%> may be <S%H3456>desolate<s%> from all that is in <S%H4393>it<s%>, because of the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of all them that live in <S%H3427>it<s%>.

And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> shall be laid <S%H2717>waste<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H8077>desolate<s%>; and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, what is that <S%H4912>proverb<s%> that you have in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H748>prolonged<s%>, and every <S%H2377>vision<s%> <S%H6>fails<s%>?

<S%H559>Tell<s%> them <S%H559>therefore<s%>, Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; I will make this <S%H4912>proverb<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>, and they shall no more use it as a <S%H4911>proverb<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; but <S%H1696>say<s%> unto <S%H3117>them<s%>, The days are at <S%H7126>hand<s%>, and the <S%H1697>effect<s%> of every <S%H2377>vision<s%>.
For there shall be no more any <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H2377>vision<s%> nor <S%H2509>flattering<s%> <S%H4738>divination<s%> <S%H8432>inside<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>, and the <S%H1697>word<s%> that I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> shall come to <S%H6213>pass<s%>; it shall be no more <S%H4900>prolonged<s%>: for in your <S%H3117>days<s%>, O <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, will I <S%H1696>say<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%>, and will <S%H6213>perform<s%> <S%H5002>it<s%>, says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came to <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H1004>behold<s%>, they of the house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H2377>vision<s%> that he <S%H2372>sees<s%> is for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> to <S%H5012>come<s%>, and he prophesies of the <S%H6256>times<s%> that are far <S%H7350>off<s%>.

Therefore <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; There shall none of my <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H4900>prolonged<s%> any <S%H1697>more<s%>, but the word which I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.
